verbose_text: Co-treatment with the TLR4 agonist LPS abolished the effects of DEX, indicating that TLR4 plays a pivotal role in ischemia / reperfusion injury and that downregulation of TLR4 expression may be the mechanism by which DEX alleviates ischemia / reperfusion injury in this model.
evidence: LPS abolished the effects of DEX, indicating that TLR4 plays a pivotal role in ischemia/reperfusion injury
